text: Rihanna was the victim of a home invasion at her Los Angeles - area home on Wednesday night ( May 9 ). Authorities were dispatched to the 30 - year - old entertainer ’ s house on Thursday morning after they were notified of a potential intruder on suspicion that her alarm had been tampered with, TMZ reports. PHOTOS : Check out the latest pics of Rihanna When the officers arrived, it had appeared that the man had spent the night in Rihanna ‘ s house. After the man came out of the house, he was reportedly tasered by the police while being detained. Luckily Rihanna was not home at the time. She ’ s been in New York City for the past few days while attending the 2018 Met Gala.
